subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|人|alt1=亻|t1=person|曾|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a kind of person (a Buddhist monk).

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{clipping|zh}} of {{ltc-l|僧伽|[[sangha]]; [[community]] of [[monk]]s, [[nun]]s, [[novice]]s and [[laity]]}}; see there for more.

subSections.title: Compounds
